content: {"name": "LIVING FAITH CHURCH", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Requires to check website for dates.", "email": "", "url": "https://lfcob.org/the-food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3251 Rock Hill Church Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Concord", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28027", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.4042599, "longitude": -80.63247480000001}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 782-3641", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
